title.rendered: SOW Health Check-up Camp, Anand Vihar School, Bhopal

content.rendered: Smile Foundation, through its Smile on Wheels Health Check-up Camp, conducted by Mrs. Pooja Bagri at Anand Vihar School, Bhopal, brought vital healthcare closer to young lives. Over 600 students participated in an engaging dental awareness session, learning about oral hygiene and preventive care instilling habits that safeguard health and nurture brighter, more confident smiles
